about_the_game:
This is a game being testing and developed

Discord:
QQ Group: 972236210

Lost Souls Roaming Aimlessly in the Distant Sky

This is a simple parkour game where you need to navigate through levels one by one using continuous exploration, quick reflexes, and map familiarity.
Trace those lost souls, and listen to their stories.

Create Your Own Levels

You can construct your own levels and share them with other players.

Parkour with Friends

You can either build your own or use other servers to enjoy the game with your friends.

Customize Your Character

You have the freedom to highly customize your character, showcasing your unique side in multiplayer games!

name: RunnerSky

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: The lost soul wanders and runs aimlessly in the distant sky.
